thread.title: Powerful Earthquake Shakes Afghanistan, Pakistan
thread.title_full: Powerful Earthquake Shakes Afghanistan, Pakistan - WSJ

author: Margherita Stancati
title: Powerful Earthquake Shakes Afghanistan, Pakistan
text:
KABUL—A 7.5-magnitude earthquake struck the Hindu Kush mountains in Afghanistan near the country’s border with Pakistan on Monday afternoon, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.
Authorities in both countries were rushing to mount rescue efforts and assess the damage after the quake, which could be felt in Kabul as well as Islamabad,...
